column.name: manufacturer_name
column.remarks: manufacturer name (as it will appear in

changeSet.author: author
changeSet.createView: select a.id AS id,a.company_name AS company_name,a.recipient_name AS recipient_name,a.street_address_1 AS street_address_1,a.street_address_2 AS street_address_2,a.street_address_3 AS street_address_3,a.city AS city,a.state AS state,a.zip_code AS zip_code,a.country AS country from channel_address a where a.id in (select pending_channel_orders.channel_address_id from pending_channel_orders)

changeSet.author: author
changeSet.createView: select a.id AS id,a.customer_id AS customer_id,a.name AS name,a.company_name AS company_name,a.email AS email,a.phone_number AS phone_number,a.channel_customer_id AS channel_customer_id from channel_customer a where a.id in (select pending_channel_orders.channel_customer_id from pending_channel_orders)

changeSet.author: author
changeSet.createView: select a.id AS id,a.channel_order_id AS channel_order_id,a.channel_order_line_item_id AS channel_order_line_item_id,a.product_id AS product_id,a.product_description AS product_description,a.channel_product_identifier AS channel_product_identifier,a.quantity AS quantity,a.tax_rate AS tax_rate,a.price AS price from channel_order_line_item a where a.channel_order_id in (select pending_channel_orders.id from pending_channel_orders)

changeSet.author: author
changeSet.createView: select channel_order.id AS id,channel_order.order_number AS order_number,channel_order.order_date AS order_date,channel_order.channel_address_id AS channel_address_id,channel_order.channel_customer_id AS channel_customer_id,channel_order.shipping_method AS shipping_method,channel_order.shipping_cost AS shipping_cost,channel_order.channel AS channel,channel_order.channel_order_id AS channel_order_id,channel_order.channel_payment_id AS channel_payment_id,channel_order.currency AS currency,channel_order.channel_order_status AS channel_order_status,channel_order.fulfillment_method AS fulfillment_method,channel_order.last_update AS last_update,channel_order.products_mapped AS products_mapped from channel_order where (isnull(channel_order.order_number) and (channel_order.channel_order_status not in ('CANCELED','UNPAID')) and (channel_order.fulfillment_method <> 'CHANNEL'))
